channel.title: Lmao funny question my npc is turning wrong way how to i make it face another :P

item.title: Lmao funny question my npc is turning wrong way how to i make it face another :P
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

if (npcs[i].walkingType == 0) {
    switch(npcs[i].npcType) {
        case 494: // banker
        /** 
        * absX and absY of a specific npc you want to change face direction, 
        * if you want all the npcs of the same type to  face 
        * the same direction remove it
        **/
        if(npcs[i].absX == 2807 && npcs[i].absY == 3344) { 

        /** 
         * this turns the npc 
         * +1 to absX makes the npc face east, 
         * -1 to absX makes it face west. 
         * +1 to absY makes it face north and 
         * -1 to absY makes it face south.
         **/
            npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY); 
		} else  if(npcs[i].absX == 2807 && npcs[i].absY == 3343) { 
			npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY); 
		} else  if(npcs[i].absX == 2807 && npcs[i].absY == 3342) { 
			npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY); 
		} else  if(npcs[i].absX == 3096 && npcs[i].absY == 3491) { 
			npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
		} else  if(npcs[i].absX == 3096 && npcs[i].absY == 3489) { 
			npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY); 
		} else  if(npcs[i].absX == 3098 && npcs[i].absY == 3492) { 
			npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1); 
		} else  if(npcs[i].absX == 3096 && npcs[i].absY == 3492) { 
			npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1); 
         }
	  break;

         default: // applies to all npc who are only standing, remove if not needed
	  npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1); 
	  break;				
    }
}

Figure out how that works.
